## ImageCache.addImage() method

Add an image definition, and optionally start loading the content.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addImage(mapView: MapView, url: string, startLoading?: boolean): ImageItem | Promise<ImageItem | undefined> | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | \[\[MapView\]\] requesting the image. |
|  url | string | URL of image. |
|  startLoading | boolean | Optional flag. If <code>true</code> the image will be loaded in the background. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| Promise&lt;[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| undefined&gt; \| undefined
